title: Question

Asking for a frnd(really)

comments.body: I don‚Äôt know if they changed the process, but back in my days, it was some fully screwed up process where we had to go online and file a lost and found report and obtain an FIR, and then submit that FIR to the office and pay some money for them to issue a new card.
